title: Rules of the game
content: At the beginning of the game, the user (district 0) is given 10 district configuration points, which he can distribute as he wishes on each field. All fields consume 1 configuration point except for the tribute field, which for each tribute added it costs 4 configuration points.
Each point invested in life gives you 5 more life.
Each point invested in strength gives you 2 more strength.
Each point invested in alliance gives you one more alliance point.
Each point invested in Cowardice gives you one more point of cowardice.
Each point invested in tributes gives you one more tribute.
The game ends when at least one member of any district survives.
